prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a massive, intimidating build and dark colors.
I want a mythical creature that embodies chaos with a gaping mouth and long limbs.
Generate a unique Pokemon featuring a blend of dark and dragon elements.
Make an oversized Pokemon that has a menacing appearance and is primarily black.
Imagine a creature that lurks in caves, characterized by its huge size and fierce nature.
Design a Pokemon resembling a monster that thrives in urban environments with a fearsome look.
Show me a powerful Pokemon with a gluttonous personality and a bright blue body.
